<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This file implements a pass to prepare loops for ppc preferred addressing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// modes, leveraging different instruction form. (eg: DS/DQ form, D/DS form with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// update)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Additional PHIs are created for loop induction variables used by load/store</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions so that preferred addressing modes can be used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1: DS/DQ form preparation, prepare the load/store instructions so that they</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    can satisfy the DS/DQ form displacement requirements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Generically, this means transforming loops like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    for (int i = 0; i &lt; n; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      unsigned long x1 = &#42;(unsigned long &#42;)(p + i + 5);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      unsigned long x2 = &#42;(unsigned long &#42;)(p + i + 9);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    to look like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    unsigned NewP = p + 5;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    for (int i = 0; i &lt; n; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      unsigned long x1 = &#42;(unsigned long &#42;)(i + NewP);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      unsigned long x2 = &#42;(unsigned long &#42;)(i + NewP + 4);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2: D/DS form with update preparation, prepare the load/store instructions so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    that we can use update form to do pre-increment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Generically, this means transforming loops like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    for (int i = 0; i &lt; n; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      array&#91;i&#93; = c;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    to look like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    T &#42;p = array&#91;-1&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    for (int i = 0; i &lt; n; ++i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      &#42;++p = c;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3: common multiple chains for the load/stores with same offsets in the loop,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    so that we can reuse the offsets and reduce the register pressure in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    loop. This transformation can also increase the loop ILP as now each chain</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    uses its own loop induction add/addi. But this will increase the number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    add/addi in the loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Generically, this means transforming loops like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    char &#42;p;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    A1 = p + base1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    A2 = p + base1 + offset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    B1 = p + base2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    B2 = p + base2 + offset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    for (int i = 0; i &lt; n; i++)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      unsigned long x1 = &#42;(unsigned long &#42;)(A1 + i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      unsigned long x2 = &#42;(unsigned long &#42;)(A2 + i)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      unsigned long x3 = &#42;(unsigned long &#42;)(B1 + i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      unsigned long x4 = &#42;(unsigned long &#42;)(B2 + i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    to look like this:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    A1&#95;new = p + base1 // chain 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    B1&#95;new = p + base2 // chain 2, now inside the loop, common offset is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                       // reused.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    for (long long i = 0; i &lt; n; i+=count) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      unsigned long x1 = &#42;(unsigned long &#42;)(A1&#95;new + i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      unsigned long x2 = &#42;(unsigned long &#42;)((A1&#95;new + i) + offset);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      unsigned long x3 = &#42;(unsigned long &#42;)(B1&#95;new + i);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      unsigned long x4 = &#42;(unsigned long &#42;)((B1&#95;new + i) + offset);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131" lineLink="#ae24a08314b082985c7f18e95ba88a993"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;bool&gt;</a> <a href="#ae24a08314b082985c7f18e95ba88a993">EnableChainCommoning</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sum of following 3 per loop thresholds for all loops can not be larger</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// than MaxVarsPrep.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// now the thresholds for each kind prep are exterimental values on Power9.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138" lineLink="#a8bb81dd59d39f0de0e484b00377caa64"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> <a href="#a8bb81dd59d39f0de0e484b00377caa64">MaxVarsUpdateForm</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;ppc-preinc-prep-max-vars&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(3),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cl/desc">cl::desc</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Potential PHI threshold per loop for PPC loop prep of update &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;form&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143" lineLink="#a7a4f277597e3bb177952f16689bf629d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> <a href="#a7a4f277597e3bb177952f16689bf629d">MaxVarsDSForm</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;ppc-dsprep-max-vars&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147" lineLink="#a1d736d124527125f52fbff8206b51235"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> <a href="#a1d736d124527125f52fbff8206b51235">MaxVarsDQForm</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;ppc-dqprep-max-vars&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(8),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cl/desc">cl::desc</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Potential PHI threshold per loop for PPC loop prep of DQ form&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Commoning chain will reduce the register pressure, so we don&#39;t consider about</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the PHI nodes number.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// But commoning chain will increase the addi/add number in the loop and also</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// increase loop ILP. Maximum chain number should be same with hardware</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// IssueWidth, because we won&#39;t benefit from ILP if the parallel chains number</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is bigger than IssueWidth. We assume there are 2 chains in one bucket, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// there would be 4 buckets at most on P9(IssueWidth is 8).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158" lineLink="#a9bada26ef15887c3dc463dc14d9bd09e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> <a href="#a9bada26ef15887c3dc463dc14d9bd09e">MaxVarsChainCommon</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;ppc-chaincommon-max-vars&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(4),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cl/desc">cl::desc</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Bucket number per loop for PPC loop chain common&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If would not be profitable if the common base has only one load/store, ISEL</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// should already be able to choose best load/store form based on offset for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// single load/store. Set minimal profitable value default to 2 and make it as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an option.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(2),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cl/desc">cl::desc</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Minimal common base load/store instructions triggering DS/DQ form &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;preparation&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171" lineLink="#a1b3ad953403b113ea465de585e4fd22b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> <a href="#a1b3ad953403b113ea465de585e4fd22b">ChainCommonPrepMinThreshold</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The base of the whole bucket.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket/#a95b371a25530ef77f17ed2a429796c80"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket/#a95b371a25530ef77f17ed2a429796c80">BaseSCEV</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// All elements in the bucket. In the bucket, the element with the BaseSCEV</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// has no offset and all other elements are stored as offsets to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BaseSCEV.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket/#ad9e30800bdcfb01f891dd1c0e48fd181"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BucketElement, 16&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket/#ad9e30800bdcfb01f891dd1c0e48fd181">Elements</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The potential chains size. This is used for chain commoning only.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket/#a55a60340e951195c3199f98ada0e9eb5"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket/#a55a60340e951195c3199f98ada0e9eb5">ChainSize</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;UpdateForm&quot; is not a real PPC instruction form, it stands for dform</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// load/store with update like ldu/stdu, or Prefetch intrinsic.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For DS form instructions, their displacements must be multiple of 4</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Prepare for one chain \\p BucketChain, find the best base element and</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Finding the minimal(chain&#95;number + reusable&#95;offset&#95;number) is a complicated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// algorithmic problem.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For now, the algorithm used here is simply adjusted to handle the case for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// manually unrolling cases.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: use a more powerful algorithm to find minimal sum of chain&#95;number and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reusable&#95;offset&#95;number for one base with multiple offsets.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PPCLoopInstrFormPrep::prepareBasesForCommoningChains(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket">Bucket</a> &amp;CBucket) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The minimal size for profitable chain commoning:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A1 = base + offset1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A2 = base + offset2 (offset2 - offset1 = X)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A3 = base + offset3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A4 = base + offset4 (offset4 - offset3 = X)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ======&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// base1 = base + offset1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// base2 = base + offset3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A1 = base1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A2 = base1 + X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A3 = base2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A4 = base2 + X</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There is benefit because of reuse of offest &#39;X&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="#a1b3ad953403b113ea465de585e4fd22b">ChainCommonPrepMinThreshold</a> &gt;= 4 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Thredhold can not be smaller than 4!\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket/#ad9e30800bdcfb01f891dd1c0e48fd181">Elements</a>.size() &lt; <a href="#a1b3ad953403b113ea465de585e4fd22b">ChainCommonPrepMinThreshold</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We simply select the FirstOffset as the first reusable offset between each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// chain element 1 and element 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;FirstOffset = CBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket/#ad9e30800bdcfb01f891dd1c0e48fd181">Elements</a>&#91;1&#93;.Offset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Figure out how many times above FirstOffset is used in the chain.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For a success commoning chain candidate, offset difference between each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// chain element 1 and element 0 must be also FirstOffset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FirstOffsetReusedCount = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Figure out how many times above FirstOffset is used in the first chain.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Chain number is FirstOffsetReusedCount / FirstOffsetReusedCountInFirstChain</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FirstOffsetReusedCountInFirstChain = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EleNum = CBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket/#ad9e30800bdcfb01f891dd1c0e48fd181">Elements</a>.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SawChainSeparater = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> j = 2; j != EleNum; ++j) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SE-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#a8bcb86d8d126d95b0dc05f09e8f3df96">getMinusSCEV</a>(CBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket/#ad9e30800bdcfb01f891dd1c0e48fd181">Elements</a>&#91;j&#93;.Offset,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         CBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket/#ad9e30800bdcfb01f891dd1c0e48fd181">Elements</a>&#91;j - 1&#93;.Offset) == FirstOffset) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SawChainSeparater)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlight">        FirstOffsetReusedCountInFirstChain++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FirstOffsetReusedCount++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For now, if we meet any offset which is not FirstOffset, we assume we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// find a new Chain.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This makes us miss some opportunities.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example, we can common:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123;OffsetA, Offset A, OffsetB, OffsetA, OffsetA, OffsetB&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as two chains:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123;&#123;OffsetA, Offset A, OffsetB&#125;, &#123;OffsetA, OffsetA, OffsetB&#125;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FirstOffsetReusedCount = 4; FirstOffsetReusedCountInFirstChain = 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// But we fail to common:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123;OffsetA, OffsetB, OffsetA, OffsetA, OffsetB, OffsetA&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FirstOffsetReusedCount = 4; FirstOffsetReusedCountInFirstChain = 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SawChainSeparater = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FirstOffset is not reused, skip this bucket.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FirstOffsetReusedCount == 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ChainNum =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FirstOffsetReusedCount / FirstOffsetReusedCountInFirstChain;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// All elements are increased by FirstOffset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The number of chains should be sqrt(EleNum).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SawChainSeparater)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ChainNum = (unsigned)sqrt((</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)EleNum);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">  CBucket.<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket/#a55a60340e951195c3199f98ada0e9eb5">ChainSize</a> = (unsigned)(EleNum / ChainNum);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this is not a perfect chain(eg: not all elements can be put inside</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rewrite the new base according to BasePtrSCEV.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb.loop.preheader:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %newstart = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb.loop.body:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %phinode = phi &#91; %newstart, %bb.loop.preheader &#93;, &#91; %add, %bb.loop.body &#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %add = getelementptr %phinode, %inc</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First returned instruciton is %phinode (or a type cast to %phinode), caller</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// needs this value to rewrite other load/stores in the same chain.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Second returned instruction is %add, caller needs this value to rewrite other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// load/stores in the same chain.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::pair&lt;Instruction &#42;, Instruction &#42;&gt;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PPCLoopInstrFormPrep::prepareBaseForDispFormChain(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket/#a4176c6f98bde7eac732a96a768fbc751">Bucket</a> &amp;BucketChain,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                       <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/#ace83c0b2fc7de869e3b41692c29c0fda">PrepForm</a> Form) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// RemainderOffsetInfo details:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// key:            value of (Offset urem DispConstraint). For DSForm, it can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                 be &#91;0, 4).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// first of pair:  the index of first BucketElement whose remainder is equal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                 to key. For key 0, this value must be 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// second of pair: number of load/stores with the same remainder.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;unsigned, std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt;</a>&gt; RemainderOffsetInfo;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> j = 0, je = BucketChain.Elements.size(); j != je; ++j) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!BucketChain.Elements&#91;j&#93;.Offset)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><span class="doxyHighlight">      RemainderOffsetInfo&#91;0&#93; = std::make&#95;pair(0, 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Remainder = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;SCEVConstant&gt;</a>(BucketChain.Elements&#91;j&#93;.Offset)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               -&gt;getAPInt()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               .urem(Form);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!RemainderOffsetInfo.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a836d9cba6deced0bb1fa7333ce5afd3a">contains</a>(Remainder))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><span class="doxyHighlight">        RemainderOffsetInfo&#91;Remainder&#93; = std::make&#95;pair(j, 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><span class="doxyHighlight">        RemainderOffsetInfo&#91;Remainder&#93;.second++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Currently we choose the most profitable base as the one which has the max</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// number of load/store with same remainder.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: adjust the base selection strategy according to load/store offset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// distribution.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example, if we have one candidate chain for DS form preparation, which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// contains following load/stores with different remainders:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1: 10 load/store whose remainder is 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2: 9 load/store whose remainder is 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3: 1 for remainder 3 and 0 for remainder 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now we will choose the first load/store whose remainder is 1 as base and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// adjust all other load/stores according to new base, so we will get 10 DS</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// form and 10 X form.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// But we should be more clever, for this case we could use two bases, one for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// remainder 1 and the other for remainder 2, thus we could get 19 DS form and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 X form.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxCountRemainder = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> j = 0; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea363b122c528f54df4a0446b6bab05515">j</a> &lt; (unsigned)Form; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea363b122c528f54df4a0446b6bab05515">j</a>++)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((RemainderOffsetInfo.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a836d9cba6deced0bb1fa7333ce5afd3a">contains</a>(j)) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><span class="doxyHighlight">        RemainderOffsetInfo&#91;j&#93;.second &gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><span class="doxyHighlight">            RemainderOffsetInfo&#91;MaxCountRemainder&#93;.second)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MaxCountRemainder = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea363b122c528f54df4a0446b6bab05515">j</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Abort when there are too few insts with common base.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RemainderOffsetInfo&#91;MaxCountRemainder&#93;.second &lt; <a href="#a31c19f4d6aaf2b683aec88dbf9320c29">DispFormPrepMinThreshold</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the first value is most profitable, no needed to adjust BucketChain</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// elements as they are substracted the first value when collecting.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MaxCountRemainder == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Adjust load/store to the new chosen base.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BucketChain.Elements&#91;RemainderOffsetInfo&#91;MaxCountRemainder&#93;.first&#93;.Offset;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> : BucketChain.Elements) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>.Offset)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="960"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="967"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="968"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="969"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: implement a more clever base choosing policy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="970"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Currently we always choose an exist load/store offset. This maybe lead to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="971"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// suboptimal code sequences. For example, for one DS chain with offsets</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="972"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123;-32769, 2003, 2007, 2011&#125;, we choose -32769 as base offset, and left disp</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="973"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for load/stores are &#123;0, 34772, 34776, 34780&#125;. Though each offset now is a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="974"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// multipler of 4, it cannot be represented by sint16.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="975"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PPCLoopInstrFormPrep::prepareBaseForUpdateFormChain(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcloopinstrformprep-cpp-/bucket/#a4176c6f98bde7eac732a96a768fbc751">Bucket</a> &amp;BucketChain) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="976"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We have a choice now of which instruction&#39;s memory operand we use as the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="977"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// base for the generated PHI. Always picking the first instruction in each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="978"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bucket does not work well, specifically because that instruction might</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="979"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be a prefetch (and there are no pre-increment dcbt variants). Otherwise,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the choice is somewhat arbitrary, because the backend will happily</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="981"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// generate direct offsets from both the pre-incremented and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="982"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// post-incremented pointer values. Thus, we&#39;ll pick the first non-prefetch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="983"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction in each bucket, and adjust the recurrence and other offsets</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="984"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// accordingly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="985"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> j = 0, je = BucketChain.Elements.size(); j != je; ++j) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="986"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;IntrinsicInst&gt;</a>(BucketChain.Elements&#91;j&#93;.Instr))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="987"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>-&gt;getIntrinsicID() == Intrinsic::prefetch)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="988"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="989"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="990"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we&#39;d otherwise pick the first element anyway, there&#39;s nothing to do.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="991"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (j == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="992"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="993"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If our chosen element has no offset from the base pointer, there&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="995"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// nothing to do.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="996"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!BucketChain.Elements&#91;j&#93;.Offset ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="997"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;SCEVConstant&gt;</a>(BucketChain.Elements&#91;j&#93;.Offset)-&gt;isZero())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="999"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1000"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = BucketChain.Elements&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea363b122c528f54df4a0446b6bab05515">j</a>&#93;.Offset;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For some DS form load/store instructions, it can also be an update form,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1133"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Find the loop invariant increment node for SCEV BasePtrIncSCEV.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb.loop.preheader:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %start = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb.loop.body:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %phinode = phi &#91; %start, %bb.loop.preheader &#93;, &#91; %add, %bb.loop.body &#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   %add = add %phinode, %inc  ; %inc is what we want to get.</span></CodeLine>
